title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Fairgrounds and Circuses
purpose: To foster the interests and traditions of Fairgrounds and Circuses throughout the United Kingdom; to progress greater understanding, appreciation and protection of their artforms, also their contribution culturally and economically to 21st Century Britain; to encourage Parliamentary support for the artforms in their navigating legislation at all levels.

contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Desmond FitzGerald, The Showmen’s Guild of Great Britain. Tel: 01784 461805
contact_details.secretariat: The Showmen’s Guild of Great Britain acts as the group's secretariat.https://showmensguild.co.uk/
